summary:
Replaces the default gold coin texture with a fine 2005 English pound coin.

Â£1.
descriptionHtml:
A replacement texture, normal map and specular map for the Gold item.

Replaces the texture with a fine 2005 English pound coin.

First mod ever so comments would be appreciated. Straightforward install, just copy the files to your game directory making sure to maintain the relative path when extracting or manually place them in \"%GameDir%\\Data\\textures\\clutter\"

Enjoy!
author: nickbizzle
